title: Why is there a punishment for dodging a game in champion select
body: Why is there a punishment for dodging a game in champion select? i can see having punishments for people leaving after having started the game, because your causing your team to lose out big time. Dodging in champ select is usually an accident or because you don't want to play with that troll that wants to play Aatrox mid in ranked. Why have a penalty? its not like its wasting to much time. its not even costing people there ranking. It wouldn't be so bad if it didn't stack the time like your some bad guy for actually wanting to have a fun ranked game experience.
